concept.title: Google Pub/Sub Subscriber
concept.shortdesc: The Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origin consumes messages from a Google Pub/Sub subscription.

conbody.p: Google Pub/Sub Subscriber originovervieworiginsGoogle Pub/Sub SubscriberWhen you configure the origin, you define the Google Pub/Sub subscription ID to receive messages from. You also define the project and credentials provider to use to connect to Google Pub/Sub. The origin can retrieve credentials from the Google Application Default Credentials or from a Google Cloud service account credentials file.
The Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origin can use multiple threads to enable parallel processing of data from a Google Pub/Sub subscription.
When available, the Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origin includes user-defined message attributes in record header attributes.
